channel.title: How to edit text?
channel.description: i posted this in question forums but thought it would be better here well the question is how do i edit the text in the text box when you log like i wanna make my own welcome thing or sumit like that and if you can tell me how to edit npc text it would be halpful and btw im using pimpscape and other sources

item.title: How to edit text?
item.dc:creator: @m_jon_h m jon h
item.description:
@m_jon_h wrote:

can u get it back anyone know and if so how??? i dont have a clue what happened to it

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit text?
item.dc:creator: @lil_0mfgorz1 lil 0mfgorz
item.description:
@lil_0mfgorz1 wrote:

[quote="-fedexer-, post:2, topic:39864"]ok mate look for something like this in your client.java

//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, ((IPPart1 << 24)+(IPPart2 << 16)+(IPPart3 << 8)+IPPart4), lastlogintime); MainHelpMenu(); //openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, (127 << 24)+1, misc.random(10));

below that you should see if(playerRights < 1) { sendMessage("Welcome to !"); sendMessage("Do not use your fearscape password on any other site or server!"); sendMessage("Change your password regularly as many people get hacked each week."); sendMessage("Offical forums not yet avalible"); }

or something very similar… just change the text in there and thats what comes up when they log in in, the “box” as you call it[/quote]

thx :d

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit text?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

ok mate look for something like this in your client.java

//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, ((IPPart1 << 24)+(IPPart2 << 16)+(IPPart3 << 8)+IPPart4), lastlogintime); MainHelpMenu(); //openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, (127 << 24)+1, misc.random(10));

below that you should see if(playerRights < 1) { sendMessage("Welcome to !"); sendMessage("Do not use your fearscape password on any other site or server!"); sendMessage("Change your password regularly as many people get hacked each week."); sendMessage("Offical forums not yet avalible"); }

or something very similar… just change the text in there and thats what comes up when they log in in, the “box” as you call it

Read full topic
